text: Nina Nikolayevna Arkhipova (Нина Николаевна Архипова; 1 May 1921Нина Архипова на сайте ruskino - 24 April 2016) was a Soviet-born Russian movie and stage actress. She was a People's Artist of the RSFSR (1988). She was known for her roles in Bountiful Summer, Prosnis i poy, Burnt by the Summer. She was born in Omsk, USSR. Arkhipova died in Moscow, Russia from complications of pneumonia on 24 April 2016, aged 94.Nina Arkhipova Dies == Recognition and Awards == * Honored Artist of the RSFSR (1967) * People's Artist of the RSFSR (1988) * Order of Friendship (1996)) * Medal In Commemoration of the 850th Anniversary of Moscow ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1921 births Category:2016 deaths Category:People from Omsk Oblast Category:Russian movie actors Category:Soviet movie actors Category:Russian stage actors
title: Nina Arkhipova
